Title: MWC 2025: The coolest (and weirdest) things we saw
Description: We lost some of the most interesting products showcased at MWC 2025.

Title: King Charles Releasing His Own Apple Music Playlist
Description:
Apple today announced that King Charles III will be releasing an Apple Music playlist next week.
Recorded at Buckingham Palace, "The King's Music Room" will spotlight some of King Charles III's favorite songs.
The playlist will feature songs from artists…

Title: Amazon Boycott Starts Today; Includes Ring, Twitch, Whole Foods
Description: A grassroots movement called the People's Union USA is asking consumers to stop spending money at Amazon and its subsidiaries for a week.

Title: Will Social Security Even Exist When I Retire? What Gen Z and Millennials Need to Know
Description:
Yes, I expect Social Security will still be around.
But your payment may not be what you think.

Title: GLP-1 Meds: Potential Benefits, Risk Factors and Overdose Info
Description: If you're considering GLP-1 agonists like Ozempic, this is what you should know beforehand.

Title: Monthly jobs report to be released. And, the White House to host a crypto event
Description:
The Labor Department will release the monthly jobs report card today, which is expected to show solid growth.
But that's not the whole picture.
And, the White House will host a cryptocurrency summit.

Title: How a measles outbreak overwhelmed a small West Texas town
Description: The kindergarten vaccination rate against the measles in Gaines County is 82%, far below the 95% needed to achieve herd immunity.

Title: US Mulls Policing Social Media of Would-Be Citizens
Description:
The U.S.
Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) is proposing to expand mandatory social media screening, currently required only for new arrivals, to include all non-citizens already residing in the U.S.
who apply for immigration benefits.
The Register …

Title: The Historic Dangers of Politicizing Our Civil Service
Description: Weakening the professional civil service could turn back the clock to an era when the government was rife with incompetence and corruption.

Title: LA wildfires: Rebuilding after losing almost everything
Description: After the Los Angeles wildfires, ABC News is following people as they rebuild their homes, deal with insurance, figure out living situations and plan for what's next.

Title: Chimamanda Adichie: ‘America Is No Longer America’
Description: Discussing Dream Count, her first novel in 12 years, the Nigerian author shares her thoughts on masculinity, political chaos, and the future of fiction.

Title: John Green on His New Nonfiction Book Everything Is Tuberculosis
Description: Novelist John Green talks about his new nonfiction book, Everything is Tuberculosis, and the inequities in treatment for the highly infectious disease.

Title: How to Watch the Total Lunar Eclipse on March 13
Description: The March 13–14 lunar eclipse will be an all-night affair you won’t want to miss

Title: Rockstar Games promotes a new trailer on social media, but it's not GTA 6 — you probably wouldn't guess in a thousand years what it was for
Description: Someone at Rockstar Games is enjoying making us suffer, and posting a trailer that ISN'T GTA 6 is living proof.

Title: Moonshot goes sideways as Intuitive Machines' second lunar lander seemingly falls over
Description:
Space is hard.
Hopefully not so hard the three rovers on this spaceship are lost For the second time this week, a privately operated spacecraft has touched down on the Moon – but this one landed badly.…
